scenario_text.value:
Oh ho, it is you, Miu! And the rest of you
have come as well! Very good, very good.
Jijimon! I was sooo worried!

Ho ho ho, I see you’re as spry as ever, Miu.
What a sight for sore eyes.

We’re happy you’re okay, Jijimon. Just what
happened here, exactly?

Well... The Master’s Kenzoku have been on the
warpath lately.

So I gathered all of the ones who can’t fight
and holed up in here.
Why would the Kenzoku attack this place?
Hrm... Can’t really say.

With the nonstop attacks coming out of
nowhere, everyone’s been quite frightened.

Yeah...
That can get pretty scary after a while.

Yo Takuma, you had something more important
to ask about, dintcha?

Jijimon, one of our friends has been
possessed by the Master.
What? By the Master... Are you sure?

Yeah. The Master’s consciousness entered her
body, and it keeps coming after us.

(I can’t tell him Miyuki’s the one attacking
this place, though...)
We want to save her.

Please, Jijimon... If there’s a way to help
her, please tell us!
Hrrmmm...

I’m afraid there is little I can teach you on
the matter.
What?

I remember many who possess such abilities.
But the Master... That’s a different story.

Normally the body’s owner could drive out the
foreign consciousness. But with the Master...
There’s...nothing you can do?

(No way... Then what will happen to Miyuki?
To this world? To OUR world?)

The only thing you can do from the outside is
call out to their soul with all you’ve got.

Call to them over and over, knocking on the
door to their heart.

And that’s just a stopgap measure. In the end
you must confront the Master to get her back.

(Continue to call to her... But for how long?
And in that time, the world will...)

(Defeating the Master is easier said than
done. Can we win against this world’s ruler?)

(Is there some other way? Some other way
to...)
(What should we do...?)
Keep calling to her...
Defeat the Master!
Some other way?
Keep calling to her...

She responded to the professor’s voice. If we
keep calling to her, then maybe...

Maybe when, exactly? And what happens if
a crisis comes calling on this world?

Right... We don’t have enough time to take
the slow and steady path.

True. We lack a concrete solution to this
quandary...
Defeat the Master!
Let’s beat the Master. There’s no other way.

Is the Master even something that can be
beaten in the first place?

They call him the “Caretaker.” An entity of
absolute power...
He even orders that Piedmon around.
What IS the Master in the first place?

If he’s like a god or whatever, can we even
fight him at all?
We know next to nothing about the Master.
Is there really nothing we can do?
Some other way?

Is there some other way? Or at least someone
who might know another way?

I’m sorry... Perhaps if I racked my brain,
some clue would rise to the surface, but...
Nothing comes to mind right now.
Oh, no...
I wish I could be of more help to all of you.
Urgh...
(Then...there’s no way to save Miyuki.)

(I bet I have a real awful look on my face
right about now. The others seem very down.)

(Even Kaito looks uncharacteristically bummed
out. I guess he actually had his hopes up.)

(Still, the situation really is hopeless.
We can’t save Miyuki, much less the world.)
Takuma...
Whoa! What’s that noise?!
Takuma, it’s the enemy!

This feeling... No doubt about it, we’ve got
a Kenzoku situation here!
It’s coming! Everyone, away from the doors!
